key_risks: Client concentration risk due to reliance on a limited number of large clients
Data security and privacy risks from handling sensitive client data
Geopolitical risks from operating in multiple countries
Competitive pressure in the BPM industry
controversies: Client termination risk with a leading client, raising revenue stability concerns
environmental_issues: Implementation of ESG practices to promote sustainable operations
social_issues: Structured and transparent HR practices reflected in recent employment agreements
governance_issues: Strong governance framework with an ISS Governance QualityScore of 3
